description.narrative: The project development objectives is to slow down the spread of HIV and build up the national capacity to respond to the epidemic by i) behavior change among vulnerable groups at high risk, and ii) improving knowledge of HIV prevention and reducing stigma related to HIV and AIDS in the general population.

condition.narrative: Adopt a national HIV/AIDS Monitoring and Evaluation Plan
Carry out integrated biological and behavioral surveys
Establish under the auspices of HACCA, a multi-sector review board (the Innovation Initiative Review Board)
Extablish (i) a Planning Committee; and (ii) an HIV-Surveillance Working Group
Prepare annual Workplan approved by HACCA
Submit Semestral and Annual Project Reports not later than 90 days after the end of the period covered by such report
